events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I want to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product in the delivery.
Assigning this refund case to our Returns Specialist to handle the refund process efficiently.
Hello, I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number so I can begin processing your refund?
I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item and here is my order number: #123456789. Please assist me with the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the incorrect item or send it back at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and the option to keep the wrong item. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully and should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard back from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
